description:
Sumomo, a popular space idol, has come down to Earth for the day.  She thinks she wants to be unknown... but is that really what she wants?  Then Giroro loses his belt and his confidence in his battle prowess, but he gains a new friendship with a stray cat he meets along the way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sumomo Idol wa Uchuu o Koete de Arimasu / Giroro Senjou no Chiisa na Tenshi de Arimasu
Sumomo, l`idole de l`espace / Giroro, petit ange de combat
すももアイドルは宇宙をこえて であります / ギロロ戦場のちいさな天使 であります
